history: TTS <speak> Welcome to CMU GetGoing <break time='1s' />.
TTS <speak> Do you need parking information around UPMC Presby campus?
USER yes
TTS <speak> Great! <break strength='strong' /> </speak>
TTS Where do you want to park? I can provide parking information around UPMC Presby, UPMC Montefiore, Kaufmann medical building, or Falk Clinic.
USER Kaufmann
TTS <speak> Sorry I can't find parking information around kaufmann's clock , please call the parking operations at (412)647-3194. <break time='800ms'/> </speak>
TTS <speak> I can also help with trip planning. <break strength='strong'/> Do you want public transit directions or driving directions
USER driving
TTS <speak> No problem. <break strength='strong' /> I will give you driving directions to your destination. <break time='800ms'/> </speak>
TTS Where do you wanna go?
USER CMU
TTS Okay, going to carnegie mellon university. <break strength='strong'/>
TTS Where are you leaving from?
USER Airport
TTS Okay, leaving from pittsburgh international airport. <break strength='strong'/>
TTS When do you want to travel
USER now
TTS Okay, travelling at 03:53 pm.
TTS <speak> Would you like me to pause after every step to give you time to write things down? </speak>
USER yes
TTS <speak> Ok, great! <break strength='strong' /> Feel free to ask me to repeat a step, <break strength='weak' /> if you didn't catch it the first time. </speak>
TTS <speak> Just a minute. Let me look up the directions. </speak>
USER yes
TTS <speak> <break time='800ms'/> There are 3 available routes, to hear a different route say ALTERNATE ROUTE. The amount of time your trip will take is approximately 28 minutes. </speak>
TTS <speak> <break time='800ms'/> Please tell me when it's ok to continue. </speak>
USER continue
TTS <speak><break time='800ms'/> The first thing that you want to do <break strength='weak'/> is to Head northeast on Airport Boulevard </speak>
TTS <speak> <break time='800ms'/> Shall I proceed? </speak>
USER yes
TTS <speak> Next, <break strength='weak'/> you should Slight left to stay on Airport Boulevard </speak>
TTS <speak> <break time='800ms'/> Shall I proceed? </speak>
USER yes
TTS <speak> Next, <break strength='weak'/> you should Keep right to stay on Airport Boulevard </speak>
TTS <speak> <break time='800ms'/> <break strength='weak' /> Let me know when you are ready for the next step. </speak>
USER next
TTS <speak> <break time='800ms'/> Please tell me when it's ok to continue. </speak>
USER continue
TTS <speak> Next, <break strength='weak'/> you should Slight left to stay on Airport Boulevard </speak>
TTS <speak> <break time='800ms'/> Please tell me when it's ok to continue. </speak>
USER continue
TTS <speak> Next, <break strength='weak'/> you should Continue straight to stay on Airport Boulevard </speak>
TTS <speak> <break time='800ms'/> <break strength='weak' /> Let me know when you are ready for the next step. </speak>
USER continue
TTS <speak> Next, <break strength='weak'/> you should Keep left at the fork, follow signs for I-376 E/. I-79 E/. Pittsburgh/. Pennsylvania Turnpike east and merge onto I-376 east. </speak>
TTS <speak> <break time='800ms'/> Please tell me when it's ok to continue. </speak>
